name: Lucía Parker
description: '''Lucía Parker Salomón''' (born January 29, 1983) is a Salvadoran Christian singer-songwriter and Christian [[worship leader]]. She is known for her singles and collaborations with other artists. She has been nominated for multiple [[Dove Awards]], [[Latin Grammy Awards]], and [[Arpa Awards]]. She has won [[Arpa Awards]] in 2014 for Best Christian Album, Best Music Video, and Best Song.
